text:
We are working with time series data, therefore an import check is to create a line plot of the
raw data. The raw data is comprised of windows of time series data per variable, and the
windows do have a 50% overlap. This suggests we may see some repetition in the observations
as a line plot unless the overlap is removed. We can start oï¬€ by loading the training dataset
using the functions developed above.
# load data
trainX, trainy = load_dataset(' train' , ' HARDataset/' )
